name: Bollywood Kitchen
description:
CONTEXT :

A Truck, an explosive chicken and a watermelon. If you are not noticing any common point between these things, it’s because you haven't yet played at “ Bollywood Kitchen “. You are an Actor in the new movie : stupid Epic Cooking. Your director has some tasks for you. Do exactly what he says to make the better film you never played and, in order to this goal: be careful about the Truck.

GAMEPLAY :

It's simple. Make sure you follow the order : avoid things when you have to, throw things... No really you just have to follow the instruction.

Programmer : Bastien Barnéoud-Chapelier

Programmer : Victor Hamcha

Programmer : Kevin 

Game Designer : Baptiste Barreyre

Game Designer : Julien Sadarnac

Game Designer : Soulaymane Guigon

Game Art : Mathias Roudot
